name: MCP Validation Fix Workflow
description: Systematic workflow for fixing MCP server validation issues, including schema problems, component loading failures, and module initialization errors

steps.description: Analyze MCP server logs to identify specific validation failures
steps.guidance: Look for patterns in error messages, count failures by type, identify root causes

steps.description: Verify which schema is being used for validation
Fix missing __init__.py files and module structure issues
steps.guidance: Ensure all Force modules have proper __init__.py files with initialize() functions

steps.description: Update validators to prefer extended schema over strict schema
steps.guidance: Modify ForceValidator to check for extended schema first

steps.description: Apply automatic fixes for common validation issues
Test MCP server startup and tool discovery
steps.guidance: Restart MCP server and verify tool loading success rate improvement
